description: Explore how indie hackers leverage open source software and licenses to create successful, scalable, and sustainable businesses. Discover inspiring success stories and the benefits of open source licenses like MIT, Apache, and GNU GPL in empowering indie developers.
keywords: indie hacking, open source licenses, MIT license, Apache license, GNU GPL, software development, entrepreneurship, innovative funding, community support, sustainable businesses
title: Indie Hacking Success Stories with Open Source Licenses
